about_the_game:
The RealFlight 676 NG Airliner delivers a commanding giant-scale presence at any flying field! With a wingspan of more than 16 feet, this airliner model features inboard and outboard ailerons and flaps, detailed and functional retractable landing gear, plus a full complement of lights. It also features an optional-use cockpit view for a unique First Person View (FPV) flying experience. With low weight for its size and plenty of power, this jet is very maneuverable...but be careful so you don’t spill the passengers’ drinks!

This is a Premium aircraft DLC, with more features and/or detail than a Standard aircraft.
detailed_description:
The RealFlight 676 NG Airliner delivers a commanding giant-scale presence at any flying field! With a wingspan of more than 16 feet, this airliner model features inboard and outboard ailerons and flaps, detailed and functional retractable landing gear, plus a full complement of lights. It also features an optional-use cockpit view for a unique First Person View (FPV) flying experience. With low weight for its size and plenty of power, this jet is very maneuverable...but be careful so you don’t spill the passengers’ drinks!

This is a Premium aircraft DLC, with more features and/or detail than a Standard aircraft.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS *: Windows 8, 10, or 11
  • Processor: Intel® Pentium® 1.0GHz or equivalent
  • Memory: 512 MB RAM
  • Graphics: Full DirectX 9 compliant
  • DirectX: Version 9.0
  • Storage: 10 GB available space
  • VR Support: SteamVR or Oculus PC. Keyboard or gamepad required
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS *: Windows 8, 10, or 11
  • Processor: Dual-Core 2.4 GHz Processor or better
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 3D Accelerated Video with: 512 MB dedicated video memory
  • DirectX: Version 9.0
  • Storage: 10 GB available space

short_description: The H676 is a fictitious widebody twin-engine airliner. This model is painted in Archipelago Airlines livery.
